prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon that excels in fighting with muscular features and an intense gaze.
I want a small, blue-colored Pokemon with a unique head accessory that shows off its strength.
Generate a fighting-type Pokemon that has a tough demeanor and is always ready to spar.
Make a Pokemon with a strong build, featuring a vibrant color palette, that embodies resilience.
Imagine a Pokemon with defined muscles and a bold expression, perfect for competitive battles.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a training athlete, with distinct colors and an energetic stance.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its fighting skills, with a striking blue color and powerful limbs.
